name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania by Acting Attorney General Gerald Pappert, v. Ronda LEWIS, Individually and d/b/a World of Giving. Appeal of Ronda Lewis

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania by Acting Attorney General Gerald Pappert, v. Ronda LEWIS, Individually and d/b/a World of Giving. Appeal of Ronda Lewis.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21th day of October, 2004 the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
The Motion to Dismiss the Appeal is dismissed as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
861 A.2d 261
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania by Acting Attorney General Gerald Pappert, v. Ronda LEWIS, Individually and d/b/a World of Giving. Appeal of Ronda Lewis.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 21, 2004.
